title: The Curious Adventures of Mr. Wonderbird

sources.title: 1952 The Curious Adventures of Mr Wonderbird
sources.description: The Curious Adventures of Mr Wonderbird

metadata.Plot: A chimney sweep and his beloved shepherdess are aided by Wonderbird (Sir Peter Ustinov) in their escape from a ruthless dictator.
metadata.Writer: Hans Christian Andersen, Paul Grimault, Jacques Prévert
metadata.Actors: Pierre Brasseur, Anouk Aimée, Serge Reggiani
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award2 wins & 2 nominations total
